alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:57PM EDT until July 21 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OXFORD AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Eustis to 15 miles west of Rangeley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eustis, Coburn Gore, Rangeley, Dallas Plantation, Upper Cupsuptic, Tim Pond, Davis, Lynchtown, Alder Stream, Merrill Strip, Chain Of Ponds, Bowmantown, Lincoln Plantation, Lower Cupsuptic, Coplin Plantation, Stetsontown, Skinner, Kibby, Jim Pond and Lang. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
